meanings.sent1: The talbots ran swiftly through the forest, tracking the scent of the prey.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor owns two talbots that he takes hunting every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The talbots decided to play hide and seek with the squirrels in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a pack of talbots on the hunt.
meanings.sent5: The talbots' howls echoed through the night, signaling their successful hunt.

meanings.sent1: The photographer used talbots to print the beautiful black and white photos.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using talbots for my photography projects because of their high quality.
meanings.sent3: The talbots in the darkroom seemed to have a mind of their own, creating unexpected images.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were captured on talbots, preserving them for generations to come.
meanings.sent5: The talbots revealed the intricate details of the landscape in the photograph.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Talbots greeted us warmly at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The Talbots have a long history of community service in our town.
meanings.sent3: The Talbots family picnic was a lively event with games and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her name echoed through the halls, a reminder of the Talbots legacy.
meanings.sent5: The Talbots name was synonymous with generosity and kindness in the neighborhood.
